Text: Can we still get a seed on this?  Sorry that I hadn't seen this torrent before, but judging from the tv series the soundtrack should be great.
Please reseed! Been trying to get this theme song for a long time!
I'm sorry, I seem to have misplaced some of the songs... if you can get me a correct track listing (song names and band names) I could try and add the missing songs.
Can we get a seed? I loved the show and am seeding it but just discovered the soundtrack torrent
Pretty please can we get a seed? I'm hanging at %60.3
I've had this thing going for almost 9 months now and i've been at 60.3% for 6 months of it.  Please please please seed this bad boy!

zsejk:

Here's the track list.

   01 12 Rounds - Touching Evil Theme
   02 Nine Inch Nails - A Warm Place
   03 Groove Armada - Edge Hill
   04 Max Rebo Band - Ray-Da
   05 12 Rounds - Mr. Johnson Take A Bow
   06 Moby - Inside
   07 Oakenfold - Zoo York
   08 Gus Gus - Is Jesus Your Pal
   09 Nine Inch Nails - The Day The World Went Away (Quiet)
   10 Craig Armstrong - This Love
   11 12 Rounds - 2 Miles
   12 Aphex Twin - Alberto Balsalm
   13 Rockers Hi-Fi - Going Under
   14 BONUS - 12 Rounds vs. KMN - Touching Evil (A KMN Experiment)

If you can't find all the tracks, at least feed the 12 Rounds stuff in, because I can't find it anywhere else. :(

BTW, if you do that, I volunteer to periodically reseed this ever after. :)
What episode did Aphex Twin appear in cause I can't find it!
PLEASE please seed! The music from the series is great!

Sadly this torrent seems defunct and is a waste of time to try downloading ...

If I can find one that works I will post a link here, until then good luck people!
